statements: SELECT * FROM live_broadcast_data;
SELECT broadcast_id, viewer_count FROM live_broadcast_data WHERE viewer_count > 100;
SELECT broadcast_id, viewer_count, chat_activity FROM live_broadcast_data ORDER BY viewer_count DESC;
SELECT broadcast_id FROM live_broadcast_data WHERE viewer_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT broadcast_id, chat_activity FROM live_broadcast_data WHERE viewer_count < 50 ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM live_broadcast_data WHERE viewer_count > 100 ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC;
SELECT broadcast_id, viewer_count FROM live_broadcast_data WHERE viewer_count BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY viewer_count ASC, broadcast_id DESC;
SELECT broadcast_id, chat_activity FROM live_broadcast_data WHERE chat_activity LIKE '%exciting%' AND viewer_count < 50 ORDER BY broadcast_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM live_broadcast_data WHERE viewer_count > 50 OR chat_activity = 'funny' ORDER BY viewer_count DESC, broadcast_id ASC;
SELECT viewer_count, chat_activity FROM live_broadcast_data WHERE viewer_count > 200 AND chat_activity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY viewer_count DESC, broadcast_id DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, viewer_count, chat_activity FROM LiveBroadcastViewers;
SELECT broadcast_name, start_time, end_time FROM BroadcastStats;
SELECT viewer_id, chat_activity FROM LiveBroadcastViewers WHERE viewer_count > 100;
SELECT broadcast_id, total_viewers, average_viewers FROM BroadcastStats WHERE total_viewers < 500;
SELECT viewer_id, viewer_count, chat_activity FROM LiveBroadcastViewers ORDER BY viewer_count DESC;
SELECT broadcast_name, start_time, end_time FROM BroadcastStats WHERE total_viewers > 1000 ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT viewer_id, viewer_count FROM LiveBroadcastViewers WHERE viewer_count >= 50 ORDER BY viewer_count DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, chat_activity FROM LiveBroadcastViewers WHERE LENGTH(chat_activity) > 100 ORDER BY viewer_id;
SELECT broadcast_id, broadcast_name, total_viewers AS current_viewers FROM BroadcastStats ORDER BY current_viewers DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT broadcast_id, broadcast_name, start_time, end_time FROM BroadcastStats WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM viewer_engagement_data;
SELECT broadcast_id, viewers_count FROM viewer_engagement_data ORDER BY viewers_count DESC;
SELECT broadcast_id, broadcast_name, broadcast_date FROM broadcast_details WHERE broadcast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT viewer_id, viewer_name, viewer_age FROM viewer_profile WHERE viewer_location = 'USA';
SELECT broadcast_id, viewers_count, chat_activity FROM viewer_engagement_data ORDER BY broadcast_id ASC, viewers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM viewer_engagement_data WHERE viewers_count > 100 ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC;
SELECT broadcast_name, broadcast_date FROM broadcast_details WHERE broadcast_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY broadcast_date ASC;
SELECT viewer_name, viewer_location FROM viewer_profile WHERE viewer_age > 30 ORDER BY viewer_name;

SELECT broadcast_name, viewers_count FROM broadcast_details INNER JOIN viewer_engagement_data ON broadcast_details.broadcast_id = viewer_engagement_data.broadcast_id WHERE viewers_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT viewer_name, viewer_age, viewer_location FROM viewer_profile WHERE viewer_location LIKE '%USA%' AND viewer_age < 40 ORDER BY viewer_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM LiveBroadcasts;
SELECT broadcast_name, start_time FROM LiveBroadcasts ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT broadcast_name, viewer_count FROM LiveBroadcasts WHERE viewer_count > 100;
SELECT viewer_name, email FROM Viewers WHERE join_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT broadcast_id, total_viewers FROM BroadcastAnalytics WHERE peak_viewers >= 500;
SELECT * FROM LiveBroadcasts ORDER BY start_time DESC, viewer_count ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT broadcast_name, start_time, end_time, viewer_count FROM LiveBroadcasts WHERE viewer_count > 1000 ORDER BY viewer_count DESC;

SELECT broadcast_name, total_viewers, peak_viewers, average_viewer_duration FROM LiveBroadcasts JOIN BroadcastAnalytics ON LiveBroadcasts.broadcast_id = BroadcastAnalytics.broadcast_id WHERE peak_viewers > 500 ORDER BY average_viewer_duration DESC;
SELECT broadcast_name, viewer_name, message, timestamp FROM LiveBroadcasts JOIN ChatActivity ON LiveBroadcasts.broadcast_id = ChatActivity.broadcast_id WHERE viewer_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT viewer_name, email, join_time FROM Viewers WHERE join_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM viewer_counts LIMIT 10;
SELECT viewer_id, viewer_name, broadcast_id FROM viewer_counts WHERE viewer_count > 100;
SELECT broadcast_name, start_time, end_time FROM broadcasts ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT message_id, viewer_id, message_text FROM chat_activity WHERE viewer_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT broadcast_id, total_revenue, ads_watched FROM monetization WHERE total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM viewer_counts ORDER BY viewer_name DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT broadcast_id, total_revenue FROM monetization WHERE total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, SUM(total_messages_sent) AS total_messages FROM viewer_stats GROUP BY viewer_id HAVING total_messages > 50;
SELECT b.broadcast_name, v.viewer_name, m.total_revenue FROM broadcasts b JOIN viewer_counts v ON b.broadcast_id = v.broadcast_id JOIN monetization m ON b.broadcast_id = m.broadcast_id;
SELECT c.*, v.viewer_count FROM chat_activity c JOIN viewer_counts v ON c.viewer_id = v.viewer_id WHERE c.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
